Name: Marian Hegemony
Description: The Marian Hegemony is a major Periphery state rimward and anti-spinward of Terra, beyond the Duchy of Tamarind-Abbey and Rim Commonality. The monarchist republican nation bears resemblance to the ancient Roman Empire with its national symbol being the bust of an armored Roman warrior against a tan banner that bears the name 'Marian Hegemony' in English at its center and the Latin words 'Pax' (Peace) and 'Mortis' (of Death) on its opposite ends.
ReputationStatements: What is it that you have against the just rule of Caesar?  Before I unleash the full might of the Legions against you, I offer one last opportunity to work for us.  Your choice.
Commander, instead of fighting the might of the Hegemony, would it not be more profitable to fight on the side of Caesar's Legions?  I have a contract for you if you are interested.
Commander, you have fought the Legions before, and acquitted yourself well.  Rather than face the might of the Hegemony again, perhaps you would prefer to take up this task?
Greetings Commander.  Our Legions are occupied at the moment, and as a result I have a task you can perform in the name of Caesar.
Hello again Commander.  Caesar appreciates your past assistance, and I am authorized to offer you another contract.
Hail Commander.  You have proved quite useful to the Marian Hegemony, and I have saved this contract as reward for your services.

Hail Commander.  If all our Legions were as effective as you, we would have an empire to match any of the Successor Houses.  I have this contract that I would entrust to no other, for your consideration.
MissionSuccessStatements: Commander, you have completed the objectives required, and have our thanks.  Payment is being transferred to your account now.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, if you were a Legionnaire I would have you flogged for your incompetence.  However, the contract stipulates partial payment for partial completion, so it has been done.
BadFaithFailureStatements: I have half a mind to enslave you and your company for failing to complete any of the objectives.  Leave my presence before I change my mind.
